name: Winnie The Pooh's Home Run Derby
name_original: Winnie The Pooh's Home Run Derby
description: Winnie the Pooh's Home Run Derby is a 2008 Japanese Flash baseball video game published at the Walt Disney Company website. The player controls Pooh in order to compete in a home run derby contest, facing off against many other characters in the series as pitchers. The game won cult following in early 2013 and became a viral hit due to its extreme difficulty, especially for a children's game.
